snippet: A suicide bomber killed herself Monday near a stadium where Nigeria’s president had just held an election rally in the northeastern city of Gombe, the police said.
abstract: Nigerian police say suicide bomber exploded vehicle with explosives near stadium at which Pres Goodluck Jonathan had held election rally, but there are no other casualties; most suicide bombings there are attributed to Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber killed herself Monday near a stadium where Nigeria’s president had just held an election rally in the northeastern city of Gombe, the police said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Suicide Bomber Strikes Near President’s Rally
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Suicide Bomber Strikes Near President’s Rally
